trans-unit.source: How to: Call a Property Procedure (Visual Basic) | Microsoft Docs
trans-unit.target: 如何︰ 呼叫屬性程序 (Visual Basic) |Microsoft 文件

trans-unit.source: How to: Call a Property Procedure (Visual Basic)
trans-unit.target: 如何：呼叫屬性程序 (Visual Basic)

trans-unit.source: You call a property procedure by storing a value in the property or retrieving its value.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將值儲存在屬性中，或擷取其值呼叫屬性程序。

trans-unit.source: You access a property the same way you access a variable.
trans-unit.target: 存取屬性相同的方式存取的變數。

trans-unit.source: The property's `Set` procedure stores a value, and its `Get` procedure retrieves the value.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的`Set`程序儲存值，並將其`Get`程序擷取的值。

trans-unit.source: However, you do not explicitly call these procedures by name.
trans-unit.target: 不過，您沒有明確呼叫這些程序的名稱。

trans-unit.source: You use the property in an assignment statement or an expression, just as you would store or retrieve the value of a variable.
trans-unit.target: 就像您儲存或擷取變數的值，您可以使用在指派陳述式或運算式中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)] makes the calls to the property's procedures.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)]會呼叫屬性程序。

trans-unit.source: To call a property's Get procedure
trans-unit.target: 呼叫屬性的 Get 的程序

trans-unit.source: Use the property name in an expression the same way you would use a variable name.
trans-unit.target: 使用屬性名稱的運算式中使用變數名稱的方式相同。

trans-unit.source: You can use a property anywhere you can use a variable or a constant.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用屬性您可以在任何地方使用的變數或常數。

trans-unit.source: -or-
Use the property name following the equal (`=`) sign in an assignment statement.
trans-unit.target: 使用下列等的屬性名稱 (`=`) 登入在指派陳述式。

trans-unit.source: The following example reads the value of the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.DateAndTime.Now%2A> property, implicitly calling its `Get` procedure.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會讀取的值<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.DateAndTime.Now%2A>屬性，以隱含方式呼叫其`Get`程序。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.DateAndTime.Now%2A>

trans-unit.source: [!code-vb[VbVbalrDateProperties#4](./codesnippet/VisualBasic/how-to-call-a-property-procedure_1.vb)]
trans-unit.target: [!code-vb[VbVbalrDateProperties #&4;](./codesnippet/VisualBasic/how-to-call-a-property-procedure_1.vb)]

trans-unit.source: If the property takes arguments, follow the property name with parentheses to enclose the argument list.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性有引數，請遵循有括號括住的引數清單的屬性名稱。

trans-unit.source: If there are no arguments, you can optionally omit the parentheses.
trans-unit.target: 如果不有任何引數，您可以省略括號。

trans-unit.source: Place the arguments in the argument list within the parentheses, separated by commas.
trans-unit.target: 將引數放在括號，以逗號分隔的引數清單。

trans-unit.source: Be sure you supply the arguments in the same order that the property defines the corresponding parameters.
trans-unit.target: 請確定您提供的引數的屬性會定義對應參數的順序相同。

trans-unit.source: The value of the property participates in the expression just as a variable or constant would, or it is stored in the variable or property on the left side of the assignment statement.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的值加入運算式如同變數或常數一般使用，或會儲存在變數或屬性指派陳述式的左邊。

trans-unit.source: To call a property's Set procedure
trans-unit.target: 若要呼叫屬性的設定程序

trans-unit.source: Use the property name on the left side of an assignment statement.
trans-unit.target: 指派陳述式的左邊使用屬性名稱。

trans-unit.source: The following example sets the value of the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.DateAndTime.TimeOfDay%2A> property, implicitly calling the `Set` procedure.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會設定的值<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.DateAndTime.TimeOfDay%2A>屬性，以隱含方式呼叫`Set`程序。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.DateAndTime.TimeOfDay%2A>

trans-unit.source: [!code-vb[VbVbcnProcedures#11](./codesnippet/VisualBasic/how-to-call-a-property-procedure_2.vb)]
trans-unit.target: [!code-vb[VbVbcnProcedures #&11;](./codesnippet/VisualBasic/how-to-call-a-property-procedure_2.vb)]

trans-unit.source: If the property takes arguments, follow the property name with parentheses to enclose the argument list.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性有引數，請遵循有括號括住的引數清單的屬性名稱。

trans-unit.source: If there are no arguments, you can optionally omit the parentheses.
trans-unit.target: 如果不有任何引數，您可以省略括號。

trans-unit.source: Place the arguments in the argument list within the parentheses, separated by commas.
trans-unit.target: 將引數放在括號，以逗號分隔的引數清單。

trans-unit.source: Be sure you supply the arguments in the same order that the property defines the corresponding parameters.
trans-unit.target: 請確定您提供的引數的屬性會定義對應參數的順序相同。

trans-unit.source: The value generated on the right side of the assignment statement is stored in the property.
trans-unit.target: 指派陳述式右邊所產生的值儲存在屬性中。

trans-unit.target: 另請參閱
